definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Anhui cuisine is one of the eight great traditions of Chinese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 徽菜是中國傳統的八大菜系之一。

sentences.english: The Anhui Province Jixi County is the emblem vegetable birthplace, the element reputation "township of the emblem kitchen".
sentences.chinese: 安徽省績溪縣是徽菜的發祥地，素譽“徽廚之鄉”。

sentences.english: Anhui cuisine, as one of the eight traditional Chinese cuisine, is deeply loved by the people.
sentences.chinese: 徽菜作爲中國傳統八大菜系之一深得人們的喜愛。

sentences.english: In order to promote the emblem vegetable enterprise, this article proposes several feasible measures.
sentences.chinese: 爲振興徽菜事業，本文提出幾條可行的措施。

definition: dish containing a variety of meats and vegetables arranged in a broth in a clay pot/chafing dish
signature dish/a restaurant’s most famous dish
stir-fried pork, favorite of Northern Song writer Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼, a.k.a. Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡
